GSILabs.connect

Interface LocalFinder

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    AdminGateway, ClientGateway
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    PublicBusinessSystem

    public interface LocalFinder
extends java.rmi.Remote
    This interface represents a remote gateway to access in read mode information about the events in the system.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Local getLocal(java.lang.String name)
      Retrieves an Locals that matches EXACTLY (up to the case and/or spacing), the name.
      Local[] getLocals(java.lang.String name)
      Retrieves all the Locals that match, either partial o totally (up to the case and/or spacing), the name given as argument.
